phrases: We will pass Hosu City...
I wonder how Iida's doing...
Nomu!
Kid, sit down!
Grand Torino!
Everyone, please calm down!
Please return to your seats for now!
The villain is not here anymore.
Please wait calmly for the heroes...
Excuse me!
I am getting out!
Hey, you!
Wait, it is dangerous!
Izuku Midoriya - Quirk: One For All
They look different, but there cannot be that many with their brains spilling out like that.
Could it be Nomu's brother?
Why here...?
I do not have time for any detours.
I need to show the fruits of my training...
One For All-
Full Cowling!
It is okay, I can do it!
Gran Torino, please be okay!
Hero Killer: Stain vs YOU.A. Students
It is a villain!
Wh-Where are the heroes?
Pro Hero - Gran Torino - Quirk: Jet
How many years has it been since I have fought in earnest?
I have gotten mixed up in something crazy!
I will not let you do whatever you want!
He is fast!
But-
Not faster than I can handle!
Hey-
He is attacking indiscriminately, huh?
Stop it, you little-
I was looking for the hero killer,
but this guy's timing was bad...
I do not know who you are, honored elder...
You are...
Seriously?
Why are you here?
Is not it obvious?
It is because I am a hero.
The center of the commotion is where it started.
But what is with this guy that looks like Nomu?
If he is got crazy power like the one at USJ...
It will not just be Gran Torino that will be in trouble-the whole city will be!
Iida, who is doing his internship here, will be, too!
What should I do?
Think!
What would be the best thing to do?
Tenya!
Tenya!
Oh man...
What is this...?
Manual!
Put out the fire!
R-Right!
The voice from earlier!
Normal Hero?
Where Iida went for his internship!
Pro Hero - Manual
Why did you choose a time like this to go off somewhere, Tenya!
He went off somewhere?
At a time like this?
That diligent Iida did?
Hey, you are in the way!
Get back!
I-I am sorry!
We will hold him back here!
Follow the police's evacuation instructions!
Where is Tenya?!
It is weird for Iida to go off with such a major incident in front of him-
Hosu City...
Guys that look like Nomu...
Iida...
Hosu...
Hero Killer...
Do not tell me-!
Damn it, what is with these guys?!
Wh-What is with that power?
The Fly!
Hey, what is the situation?
What are these monsters after?
Nomus really are great...
Villain - Kurogiri - Quirk: Warp Gate Villain - Tomura Shigaraki - Quirk: Decay
You will not participate in the combat?
Are you stupid?
I am injured.
That is why I brought those guys.
Master, how many Nomus have you finished?
They are not as strong as the one from the USJ attack,
but I have finished verifying the behavior of six.
Give them to me.
Why?
Because I do not like the hero killer.
I can destroy the things I do not like, right, Master?
Very well.
However, you may only have three.
You should use this as a learning experience.
Once the night is over, the world will have forgotten about you,
Hero Killer.
A child wearing a suit...
Villain - Stain Tenya Iida - Quirk: Engine
Who are you?
I am the younger brother of the hero you attacked.
The younger brother of a most excellent older brother!
I have come to stop you in his place!
Will you take this name for me?
Remember my name for as long as you live!
Ingenium.
It is the name of the hero who will defeat you!
I see.
Die.
Like I would!
Ingenium.
You are brothers, huh?
In order to let news of me spread...
You are weak.
You and your brother are both weak.
Because you are fakes.
Shut up, villain!
He is paralyzed from the waist down due to spinal cord damage!
He cannot work as a hero anymore!
Tensei is an excellent hero who saved many people... and led them until now...
There is no reason for you to crush him...
Tensei, I am very proud of you.
You have become independent at a young age, with many sidekicks who follow you.
Tensei Iida
That is not an easy feat.
It is not that they follow me, Dad.
It is the opposite.
I cannot do anything by myself, yet, so they are supporting me.
I need to work hard to return the favor, too.
I am not that talented or anything, but I have to live up to the name of hero.
I am glad that my work helps many people.
He is my hero...
He was an excellent hero who gave me a dream!
I will not forgive you...
I will kill you!
Save that guy first.
Pro Hero - Native
Reflect on yourself and save others.
Do not use your power for yourself.
Being taken in by the hatred before you and trying to fulfill your own desires...
That is the furthest from what a hero should be.
That is why you will die.
M-My body will not move...
Goodbye.
You are an offering to a more just world.
Shut up...
Shut up...
If you admire me, Tenya, then I might become an amazing hero.
No matter what you say, you are the criminal who hurt my brother!
Smash!
Mi...
Midoriya...?
I came to save you, Iida!
Tenya Iida Quirk: Engine
He can run very fast using the engines in his calves.
Affiliation: YOU.A. High School Hero Class 1-A Birthday: 8/22 Height: 179 cm Blood Type: A Likes: Beef Stew
Shoto Todoroki Quirk: Half-Cold, Half-Hot He has two Quirks:'freezing' on his right half and'flames' on his left half.
Affiliation: YOU.A. High School Hero Class 1-A Birthday: 1/11 Height: 176 cm Blood Type: O Likes: Soba (the kind that is not hot)
I might be overthinking it.
I have absolutely no proof, either.
But that does not mean I can do nothing.
In the city where the hero killer appeared,
guys like Nomu are running wild.
In this city, there is probably an unease that only I can imagine-
That the League of Villains and the hero killer are connected somehow!
Does this mean the hero killer is also in this city right now?
Since Iida was not at the fight earlier,
that means he probably found the hero killer!
Bingo!
That kid...
He is the one from Shigaraki's picture...
Midoriya, why?
They talked about it on TV.
That 60 of the hero killer's victims were found in places without many people.
That is why I searched away from the center of the commotion
in the alleyways near Normal Hero Agency.
I searched them all one by one!
Can you move?
Let us get to a bigger street.
We need help from the pros.
I cannot... move my body...
Ever since he cut me...
I think it is his Quirk...
It is just as the commentators on TV guessed!
So cutting is how he activates his Quirk?
There is someone else here!
If it would just been Iida, I could have carried him away on my shoulder...
Midoriya...
Do not get involved!
This has nothing to do with you!
What are you saying?
Your friend came to save you.
That is a great line, is not it?
But I have a duty to kill him.
If we clash, of course, the weaker will be culled.
Now, what will you do?
The eyes of white-collar criminals like you burn silently.
He is different from the guys at USJ.
His eyes are those... of a killer.
Your location has been sent!
Even without any proof, even if it was just a guess,
I should have done whatever I could to get a pro to come with me.
I will protect the two who cannot move
and stall for time by myself.
I will try to drive the hero killer away if I can!
Stop it!
Run away!
I told you, did not I?
It has nothing to do with you!
If you say that, then heroes cannot do anything!
Th...
There are a lot of things I would like to say,
but I will say them later.
Meddling when you do not need to...
Good.
Get close to him in one movement.
To shorten the distance between him and an opponent with a long reach...
It was a good decision.
No!
If you get cut-
Now then...
He disappeared?
No...
Five percent Detroit...
What is with that movement?
He is moving like Bakugo...
Did it work?
Full Cowling worked!
I can fight!
Wh...
My body...
Did he graze me?
Such a small graze made me unable to move?
No...
I see...
It is blood!
It was not powerful enough.
It is not that you saw through my movements.
You left my field of vision
and maneuvered so that you would definitely be able to bring me down...
That was what your movements were like.
People who are all talk are a dime a dozen,
but you are worth letting live.
You are different from these guys.
Damn it...
Stop it!
Stop it...!
One after another...
There are a lot of people getting in my way today.
Midoriya.
You need to give more details in times like this.
Shoto Todoroki - Quirk: Half-Cold, Half-Hot
You made me late.
T-Todoroki, you too?
Why are you here...?
And you are using your left side...
Why?
That is my line.
It took me a few seconds to figure out what you meant
since you sent just your location info.
You are not really one to send that for no reason.
You meant that you were in trouble and to call for help, right?
Do not worry.
The pros will also get here in a few minutes.
That is hot...!
Someone is time will be up soon, huh?
This is just like the information about him implies.
I will not let you kill these guys, Hero Killer.
Todoroki, you cannot let this guy see your blood!
I think he controls his opponents' actions by ingesting their blood orally.
That is how he got all of us!
He sucks blood to keep people from moving.
That is why he uses blades, huh?
I can keep my distance and-
Shoot!
You have good friends, Ingenium!
A sword?!
He threw it at the same time as the knife-
That was close...!
He is strong...
Why are you two...
Why...
Please, stop!
I have inherited my brother's name.
I have to do it...
That guy's mine...!
You inherited it?
That is strange.
The Ingenium I saw before did not have that look on his face, though.
You have got a lot going on behind the scenes in your family, too, huh?
Todoroki...
Huh?
To block your own view against an opponent faster than you...
What a foolish plan.
I wonder about that.
You are pretty good, too.
Above you!
Midoriya!
I can move normally for some reason now!
A time limit?
No, that kid should have been the last one he got.
I cannot move yet.
Is this guy's blood type O?
Get back, Midoriya!
He takes in a person's blood to keep them from moving.
Since I got free first...
I can think of three possible reasons.
It could be less effective with more people,
the amount ingested could affect how long it works,
or there could be a difference in effectiveness based on a person's blood type!
Blood type...?
Mine is B...
I am type A...
Blood type?
That is correct.
Stain - Quirk: Bloodcurdle
Hero Killer: Stain.
Quirk: Bloodcurdle.
Just by tasting someone is blood, he can stop their movements for up to 8 minutes.
Type O, A, AB, and B.
The amount of time he can stop them goes in that order from least to most.
I cannot really do anything just by knowing his Quirk, though.
I wanted to hurry up and carry those two out of here,
but he can react so fast, he can avoid ice and fire.
I cannot leave myself that open.
I think our best option is to hold on by avoiding close combat until the pros get here.
Todoroki, you have already she would too much blood.
I will distract him, so you support me from behind!
That is a pretty big risk,
but yeah...
The two of us will protect them!
Two against one, huh?
It will not be easy.
Iida, I have been worried about you since your older brother was attacked,
because I know well the face of someone who would act on pent-up resentment.
I also know just how narrow the field of vision can get for someone like that.
That day, I told her everything about what had happened and about who I am now.
Mother cried and apologized, forgiving me with a smile surprisingly quickly.
She said that for me to move forward without anything holding me back
would make her happy and be her salvation.
The old me would definitely not have been able
to choose my old man's agency for the internship.
It is not that I have forgiven him, and I have no intention of doing so.
It was just so I could experience the fact that he is the number two hero
with my own eyes and body and accept that.
Get ready.
We are going out.
Where?
To do what?
If this incident follows precedent, then the hero killer will appear in Hosu City again.
We will go to Hosu for a time on a business trip and work there.
Contact Hosu City immediately!
Pro Hero - Endeavor - Quirk: Hellflame
Yes, sir!
No matter what a scumbag he is,
I had to appreciate the judgment and instincts of the man called the number two hero.
Everything was so simple!
But even though it was simple, I did not see it.
It is your power, is not it?!
Just a few words...
Those few words...
Save that guy first.
I came to save you, Iida!
The two of us will protect them!
I will kill you!
This guy's movements are completely different from before!
Midoriya!
Please stop...
I am... already...
If you want us to stop, then stand up!
Look properly at what you want to be!
Ingenium.
It is the name of the hero who will defeat you!
Preview
Here is the preview!
Run away, Midoriya!
This has nothing to do with you!
If you say that, then heroes cannot do anything!
Iida, I have been worried about you since your older brother was attacked.
It is like what All Might said...
I also know just how narrow the field of vision can get for someone like that.
Meddling when you do not need to...
I am not qualified to be called a hero.
But that does not mean I can give in.
If I give in, then Ingenium will die!
Next time: Climax
Next time, Climax.
